data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Johnson, Leigh A., Gowen, David (2017): Ex uno, multis: taxonomic revision in Navarretiadivaricata (Polemoniaceae) and the recognition of four additional cryptic or near-cryptic species. PhytoKeys 91: 39-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.91.21530, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.91.21530
